lines.text: Fame is the first disgrace, because God knows who you are. God knows who YOU are!
I never pay for sex, Ray, because Jesus Christ paid for our sins.
Come on then, Ray. Privately trained, Ray. Huh. Ray.
I could drink you under the table!
Have to be a small table!

[to David]
Stop laughin'! You sound like a clam goin' mad!

[rhetorically to David]
You know how to keep an old Englishman happy? Tell him a joke when he's young.
